items.title: Man denies deliberately driving into crowd at Liverpool parade
items.description: Paul Doyle, 53, denies 31 charges including causing grievous bodily harm with intent.
items.content: Paul Doyle, 53, denies 31 charges including causing grievous bodily harm with intent.

items.title: Martha's rule rolled out to all acute hospitals in England after hundreds of lives saved
items.description: Hundreds of patients have been helped by rule, which makes it easier to get an urgent second opinion.
items.content: Hundreds of patients have been helped by rule, which makes it easier to get an urgent second opinion.

items.title: World's largest sports piracy site shut down by police
items.description: The take-down of the site has been championed as a major victory for live sports broadcasters.
items.content: The take-down of the site has been championed as a major victory for live sports broadcasters.

items.title: Fashion college campus, home extension and Big Ben tower up for architecture award
items.description: The restoration of London's famous Elizabeth Tower is nominated for the prestigious Stirling Prize.
items.content: The restoration of London's famous Elizabeth Tower is nominated for the prestigious Stirling Prize.

items.title: Graham Linehan goes on trial over alleged harassment of trans woman
items.description: The Father Ted creator is on trial at Westminster Magistrates' Court days after a separate arrest at Heathrow.
items.content: The Father Ted creator is on trial at Westminster Magistrates' Court days after a separate arrest at Heathrow.

items.title: It's 4,000 miles from Ukraine - but even this Asian city is part of Russia's war
items.description: In Vladivostok, a city on China's and North Korea's border, Russia's war on Ukraine looms large.
items.content: In Vladivostok, a city on China's and North Korea's border, Russia's war on Ukraine looms large.

items.title: Sophie Turner to play Lara Croft in Tomb Raider series
items.description: The Game of Thrones actress will star in the new Prime Video show, helmed by Phoebe Waller-Bridge.
items.content: The Game of Thrones actress will star in the new Prime Video show, helmed by Phoebe Waller-Bridge.

items.title: My toddler's constipation wasn't taken seriously until he reached crisis point
items.description: The number of children being admitted to hospital with constipation is at a 10-year high.
items.content: The number of children being admitted to hospital with constipation is at a 10-year high.

items.title: 'It collapsed like a cardboard box': Witnesses describe fatal Lisbon crash
items.description: The crash killed at least 17 people and injured 20 more, some critically, Portuguese authorities say.
items.content: The crash killed at least 17 people and injured 20 more, some critically, Portuguese authorities say.

items.title: Who are the victims?
items.description: A transport worker is among those killed, while a three-year-old German boy is reported to have escaped with minor injuries.
items.content: A transport worker is among those killed, while a three-year-old German boy is reported to have escaped with minor injuries.
